publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5793 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow Film Festival—That the Parliament welcomes the sixth annual Glasgow Film Festival; notes its increasing audience numbers, with more than 28,000 people attending screenings and talks during 2009, and hopes that it will continue to go from strength to strength and will continue to provide unique premieres, special screenings, events and guests. Supported by: Helen Eadie*, Bill Kidd*, Patrick Harvie*, John Wilson*, Charlie Gordon*, Karen Whitefield*, Patricia Ferguson*, Rhona Brankin*, Jackie Baillie*, Aileen Campbell*, Kenneth Gibson*

S3M-5793 Glasgow Film Festival (lodged on 22 February 2010) Hugh O’Donnell*, Stuart McMillan*, Elaine Smith*, John Park*, James Kelly*, Bob Doris*, Robin Harper*, Jamie Hepburn*, Mary Mulligan*, Sarah Boyack*, Jim Tolson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Aitken*
S3M-5793 Glasgow Film Festival (lodged on 22 February 2010) Hugh Henry*, Trish Godman*
S3M-5793 Glasgow Film Festival (lodged on 22 February 2010) Marilyn Livingstone*
